title: NINJUTSU: The Art of the Ninja
itunes:title: NINJUTSU: The Art of the Ninja
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
NINJUTSU: The Art of the Ninja. Greatest Warrior Quotes of All Time! These are the greatest quotes and lessons from the masters of Ninjutsu. Ninjutsu, or ninpō, is the strategy and tactics of unconventional warfare, guerrilla warfare and espionage purportedly practised by the ninja. It was a separate discipline in some traditional Japanese schools.


Speaker:


Marcus Taylor: http://bit.ly/38FUFoS


Music:


Secession Studios


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
